Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Hallowed Reach
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Hallowed Reach to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Hallowed Reach to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is a fascinating series, especially since it's banned in Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: <span class="italic">Witchcraft, Spies, and Complaints/i>. The Order definitely wouldn't want this book to be published. As a result, it was sent to the ends of the earth, along with those people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm really impressed, {PlayerName}, that you were able to gather all these books!
